relatedBlades.title: Analyst Report: Cloudflare is positioned highest for "Ability to Execute" in the 2020 Gartner Magic Quadrant for WAF
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare receives highest placement in the "Ability to Execute" axis and furthest placement for its completeness of vision in the Challengers' quadrant, in the 2020 "Magic Quadrant for Web Application Firewalls" report.

Cloudflare's Web Application Firewall (WAF) is an integral part of Cloudflare's integrated cloud-based security solution - designed to secure any combination of platforms, including public cloud, private cloud, on-premise, SaaS applications, and IoT devices. Cloudflare protects approximately %{GlobalWebsiteCountWords} million Internet properties for its customers which range from %{Fortune1000Percentage} of Fortune 1,000 companies that require enterprise-grade security solutions to individual developers and small businesses.

__Cloudflare's Web Application Firewall advantage that fuels customer and product momentum:__ 1. ____Product Innovation and Velocity:____ Cloudflare has released numerous WAF features at an unparalleled velocity of product innovation in the past year to help our customers build a strong security posture -- API Shield to provide strong authentication for APIs, ability to create rules based on analytics, enhancements for higher accuracy to block bad bots and many more.

2. ____Ease of use and management:____ From individual developers to enterprise companies, Cloudflare's customers find the Cloudflare WAF user interface and API easy to use and deploy. Our powerful pre-built rulesets and fast rule propagation speed of under 30s globally enables our customers for a faster time to productivity for their WAF. As the threat landscape changes quickly, it's important to easily and quickly analyze and mitigate new attack vectors.

3. ____Threat Intelligence at-scale:____ Cloudflare continuously improves its WAF offering using deep analysis of rich data sets collected from approximately %{GlobalWebsiteCountWords} million Internet properties that we secure for our customers. We blocked approximately 76B cyber threats on an average each day in Q3'20.

4. ____Integrated Offering:____ Customers value the integration of Cloudflare's WAF with our other Cloudflare products including Bot Management, Cloudflare Access, DDoS, CDN, managed DNS features, Cloudflare Workers and more. Cloudflare delivers strong security with high performance through an integrated approach.

5. ____Third party integrations:____ Cloudflare's API first mindset delivers out-of-the-box integrations with leading third parties including Splunk, Sumo Logic, Terraform, and more. Customers have demonstrated accelerated DevOps and DevSecOps deployment processes with the help of Cloudflare APIs.

1) Gartner, "Magic Quadrant for Web Application Firewalls", Analyst(s): Jeremy D'Hoinne, Adam Hils, John Watts, Rajpreet Kaur, October 19, 2020.

*This graphic was published by Gartner, Inc. as part of a larger research document and should be evaluated in the context of the entire document. The Gartner document is available upon request from Cloudflare.
